name: Mr. Bear's Bizarre Adventure
description:
Player will act as a bear who master in Chinese blade. He travels around the world and challenging Kungfu masters from various countries:
the guardian warrior at the Inari Shrine, the skeleton king in the dark dungeon and the pirate captain from the Caribbean sea....
We even adapted different music styles for each themed level: traditional Japanese sounds, Shamisen music, Lo-Fi, HipHop, Trap, and Reggae!

Characteristic

  • ：Base the music rhythm, fight with your opponent,

  • Different enemies feature in various attack style. Players can identify the attack direction and beat back accordingly,

  • During the music highlight, players can use combo hit unlimitedly.
